alert.note: Alert for Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 27 at 3:22PM CDT until August 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY EVENING FOR MUCH OF SOUTHEAST WYOMING... ...ELEVATED CONDITIONS ALSO POSSIBLE IN WESTERN NEBRASKA... ...NEAR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS POSSIBLE ON SUNDAY AFTERNOON... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 436 AND 437... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect for Sunday afternoon through early Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 436.Fire weather zone 437. * WIND...West to northwest 15 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 30 MPH. * HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument
